bio: A Yo-kai who calls himself a Yo-kai Butler. He appears to be a font of Yo-kai info, but he's really just reading it off his Yo-kai Pad.

soultimate.name: Blabber Mouth
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drops foe's Defense by 24% for 20 seconds.
soultimate.description: Attack to decrease foes' defense for a time.

skill.effect: 10% more likely to cause criticals for all allies.
skill.name: Worldy Whisdom

name: Whisper
